translations.‚ö†Ô∏è The smart pickers have been remov:
‚ö†Ô∏è The smart pickers have been removed from this app
as they are now included in the [Assistant app](https://apps.nextcloud.com/apps/assistant).

This app implements:

* Text generation providers: Free prompt, Summarize, Headline, Context Write, Chat, and Reformulate (using any available large language model)
* A Translation provider (using any available language model)
* A SpeechToText provider (using Whisper)
* An image generation provider

‚ö†Ô∏è Context Write, Summarize, Headline and Reformulate have mainly been tested with OpenAI.
They might work when connecting to other services, without any guarantee.

Instead of connecting to the OpenAI API for these, you can also connect to a self-hosted [LocalAI](https://localai.io) instance or [Ollama](https://ollama.com/) instance
or to any service that implements an API similar to the OpenAI one, for example:
[IONOS AI Model Hub](https://docs.ionos.com/cloud/ai/ai-model-hub), [Plusserver](https://www.plusserver.com/en/ai-platform/) or [MistralAI](https://mistral.ai).

‚ö†Ô∏è This app is mainly tested with OpenAI. We do not guarantee it works perfectly
with other services that implement OpenAI-compatible APIs with slight differences.

## Improve AI task pickup speed

To avoid task processing execution delay, setup at 4 background job workers in the main server (where Nextcloud is installed). The setup process is documented here: https://docs.nextcloud.com/server/latest/admin_manual/ai/overview.html#improve-ai-task-pickup-speed

## Ethical AI Rating
### Rating for Text generation using ChatGPT via the OpenAI API: üî¥

Negative:
* The software for training and inference of this model is proprietary, limiting running it locally or training by yourself
* The trained model is not freely available, so the model can not be run on-premises
* The training data is not freely available, limiting the ability of external parties to check and correct for bias or optimise the model's performance and CO2 usage.


### Rating for Translation using ChatGPT via the OpenAI API: üî¥

Negative:
* The software for training and inference of this model is proprietary, limiting running it locally or training by yourself
* The trained model is not freely available, so the model can not be run on-premises
* The training data is not freely available, limiting the ability of external parties to check and correct for bias or optimise the model's performance and CO2 usage.

### Rating for Image generation using DALL¬∑E via the OpenAI API: üî¥

Negative:
* The software for training and inferencing of this model is proprietary, limiting running it locally or training by yourself
* The trained model is not freely available, so the model can not be ran on-premises
* The training data is not freely available, limiting the ability of external parties to check and correct for bias or optimise the model‚Äôs performance and CO2 usage.


### Rating for Speech-To-Text using Whisper via the OpenAI API: üü°

Positive:
* The software for training and inferencing of this model is open source
* The trained model is freely available, and thus can run on-premise

Negative:
* The training data is not freely available, limiting the ability of external parties to check and correct for bias or optimise the model‚Äôs performance and CO2 usage.

### Rating for Text-To-Speech via the OpenAI API: üî¥

* The trained model is not freely available, so the model can not be ran on-premises
* The training data is not freely available, limiting the ability of external parties to check and correct for bias or optimise the model‚Äôs performance and CO2 usage.

### Rating for Text generation via LocalAI: üü¢

Positive:
* The software for training and inferencing of this model is open source
* The trained model is freely available, and thus can be ran on-premises
* The training data is freely available, making it possible to check or correct for bias or optimise the performance and CO2 usage.


### Rating for Image generation using Stable Diffusion via LocalAI : üü°

Positive:
* The software for training and inferencing of this model is open source
* The trained model is freely available, and thus can be ran on-premises

Negative:
* The training data is not freely available, limiting the ability of external parties to check and correct for bias or optimise the model‚Äôs performance and CO2 usage.


### Rating for Speech-To-Text using Whisper via LocalAI: üü°

Positive:
* The software for training and inferencing of this model is open source
* The trained model is freely available, and thus can be ran on-premises

Negative:
* The training data is not freely available, limiting the ability of external parties to check and correct for bias or optimise the model‚Äôs performance and CO2 usage.

Learn more about the Nextcloud Ethical AI Rating [in our blog](https://nextcloud.com/blog/nextcloud-ethical-ai-rating/).
translations.JSON object. Check the API documentation: JSON object. Check the API documentation to get the list of all available parameters. For example: {example}
translations.Failed to save OpenAI admin options: Failed to save OpenAI admin options
translations.The Assistant app is not enabled. You ne: The Assistant app is not enabled. You need it to use the features provided by the OpenAI/LocalAI integration app.
translations.With the current configuration, the targ: With the current configuration, the target URL used to get the models is:
translations.This can be a local address with a port: This can be a local address with a port like {example}. In this case, make sure 'allow_local_remote_servers' is set to true in config.php.
translations.This name will be displayed as provider: This name will be displayed as provider name in the AI admin settings
translations.Timeout for the request to the external: Timeout for the request to the external API
translations.You can create an API key in your OpenAI: You can create an API key in your OpenAI account settings
translations.Selection of chat/completion endpoint is: Selection of chat/completion endpoint is not available for OpenAI since it implicitly uses chat completions for "instruction following" fine-tuned models.
translations.Using the chat endpoint may improve text: Using the chat endpoint may improve text generation quality for "instruction following" fine-tuned models.
translations.Split the prompt into chunks with each c: Split the prompt into chunks with each chunk being no more than the specified number of tokens (0 disables chunking)
translations.Maximum number of output tokens generate: Maximum number of output tokens generated for a single text generation prompt. This also applies to the Speech-to-Text tasks.
translations.Default image generation model to use: Default image generation model to use
translations.Use authentication for image retrieval r: Use authentication for image retrieval request
translations.Default speech generation model to use: Default speech generation model to use
translations.A list of voices supported by the endpoi: A list of voices supported by the endpoint you are using. Defaults to openai's list.
translations.A per-user quota for each quota type can: A per-user quota for each quota type can be set. If the user has not provided their own API key, and a rule is not specified for this user or any of their groups, this quota will be enforced.
translations.\"0\" means unlimited usage for a partic: "0" means unlimited usage for a particular quota type.
translations.A per-user limit for usage of this API t: A per-user limit for usage of this API type (0 for unlimited)
translations.Translation provider (to translate Talk: Translation provider (to translate Talk messages for example)
translations.Text processing providers (to generate t: Text processing providers (to generate text, summarize, context write, etc.)
translations.Speech-to-text provider (to transcribe T: Speech-to-text provider (to transcribe Talk recordings for example)
translations.This quota period is from {startDate} to: This quota period is from {startDate} to {endDate}
_The quota is kept over a floating perio: The quota is kept over a floating period of the last %n day
The quota is kept over a floating period of the last %n days
translations.Your administrator defined a custom serv: Your administrator defined a custom service address
translations.Leave the API key empty to use the one d: Leave the API key empty to use the one defined by administrators
translations.You can create a free API key in your Op: You can create a free API key in your OpenAI account settings
translations.Leave the username and password empty to: Leave the username and password empty to use the ones defined by your administrator
translations.If you see a shared quota usage of 50% a: If you see a shared quota usage of 50% and a usage of 10% that means that you have used 10% of the total shared quota, and the sum of all other users affected by this quota is 40%.
translations.Specifying your own API key will allow u: Specifying your own API key will allow unlimited usage
_Quota will be enforced based on last %n: Quota will be enforced based on last %n day of usage
Quota will be enforced based on last %n days of usage
_Quota will reset for all the users ever: Quota will reset for all the users every month on day number {nth_day}
Quota will reset for all the users every %n months on day number {nth_day}
translations.Daily quotas are floating quotas while m: Daily quotas are floating quotas while monthly reset on a certain day of the month
translations.Rules can be set for specific groups or: Rules can be set for specific groups or users. These rules will override the global quota settings.
translations.Only the rule with the highest priority: Only the rule with the highest priority is active if multiple rules match.
translations.Use \"{newParam}\" parameter instead of: Use "{newParam}" parameter instead of the deprecated "{deprecatedParam}"
